All Classes and Interfaces

类
说明
AnglePanel
Angle Learning and Recognition Panel Interface for students to learn about different types of angles and practice identifying them.
Angles
Entity class for angle resources.
App
Main class for the geometry learning application
AreaByDiameter
Visual representation for calculating the area of a circle using its diameter This class provides a graphical illustration of how to calculate the area of a circle when the diameter is known, with labeled dimensions and formulas.
AreaByDiameter.AreaByDiameterPanel
Panel for displaying the circle area calculation visualization (using diameter) Shows a graphical representation of a circle with its diameter and area formula
AreaByRadius
Visual representation for calculating the area of a circle using its radius This class provides a graphical illustration of how to calculate the area of a circle when the radius is known, with labeled dimensions and formulas.
AreaByRadius.AreaByRadiusPanel
Panel for displaying the circle area calculation visualization (using radius) Shows a graphical representation of a circle with its radius and area formula
Bonus1
Business logic for Bonus1 - Compound Area Calculation Challenge.
Bonus1
Bonus Task Interface Bonus 1: Compound Shape Area Calculation Provides an interactive interface for students to practice calculating areas of complex compound shapes.
Bonus1.Result
Enumeration of possible answer check results.
Bonus2
Business logic for Bonus2 - Sector Area Calculation Challenge.
Bonus2
Bonus Task Interface Bonus 2: Sector Area Calculation Provides an interactive interface for students to practice calculating areas of circle sectors with different angles and radii.
Bonus2.Result
Enumeration of possible answer check results.
CByDiameter
Visual representation for calculating the circumference of a circle using its diameter This class provides a graphical illustration of how to calculate the circumference of a circle when the diameter is known, with labeled dimensions and formulas.
CByDiameter.CByDiameterPanel
Panel for displaying the circle circumference calculation visualization (using diameter) Shows a graphical representation of a circle with its diameter and circumference formula
CByRadius
Visual representation for calculating the circumference of a circle using its radius This class provides a graphical illustration of how to calculate the circumference of a circle when the radius is known, with labeled dimensions and formulas.
CByRadius.CByRadiusPanel
Panel for displaying the circle circumference calculation visualization (using radius) Shows a graphical representation of a circle with its radius and circumference formula
Circle
Circle Area and Circumference Calculation interface Task 4: Provides interactive exercises for students to calculate circle area and circumference using both radius and diameter measurements.
ColorScheme
Color scheme manager for the application.
CompoundArea
Entity class for compound geometric shapes.
KidButton
A custom child-friendly button component with rounded corners and animation effects.
MainFrame
Main window of the application
Parallelogram
Visual representation for calculating the area of a Parallelogram This class provides a graphical illustration of how to calculate the area of a parallelogram with labeled dimensions and formulas.
Parallelogram.ParallelogramPanel
Panel for displaying the parallelogram area calculation visualization Shows a graphical representation of a parallelogram with its dimensions and area formula
Rectangle
Visual representation for calculating the area of a Rectangle This class provides a graphical illustration of how to calculate the area of a rectangle with labeled dimensions and formulas.
Rectangle.RectanglePanel
Panel for displaying the rectangle area calculation visualization Shows a graphical representation of a rectangle with its dimensions and area formula
SectorArea
Entity class for circular sector area calculations.
Shape2DPanel
2D Shape Learning and Recognition Interface This panel provides an interactive interface for students to learn and identify different 2D geometric shapes.
Shape3DPanel
3D Shape Learning and Recognition Interface This panel provides an interactive environment for students to learn and identify different three-dimensional geometric shapes.
ShapeArea
Shape Area Calculation interface Task 3: Shape Area Calculation This panel provides an interactive interface for students to practice calculating areas of various 2D shapes.
Shapes2D
Entity class for 2D geometric shapes.
Shapes3D
Entity class for 3D geometric shapes.
Task12D
Business logic for Task12D - 2D shape recognition task.
Task13D
Business logic for Task13D - 3D shape recognition task.
Task2
Business logic for Task2 - Angle recognition task.
Task3
Business logic for Task3 - Area calculation for basic shapes (Rectangle, Triangle, Parallelogram, Trapezium).
Task4
Business logic for Task4 - Circle Area and Circumference Calculations.
TaskStatusButton
A specialized button component for displaying task status in the application.
Trapezium
Visual representation for calculating the area of a Trapezium This class provides a graphical illustration of how to calculate the area of a trapezium with labeled dimensions and formulas.
Trapezium.TrapeziumPanel
Panel for displaying the trapezium area calculation visualization Shows a graphical representation of a trapezium with its dimensions and area formula
Triangle
Visual representation for calculating the area of a Triangle This class provides a graphical illustration of how to calculate the area of a triangle with labeled dimensions and formulas.
Triangle.TrianglePanel
Panel for displaying the triangle area calculation visualization Shows a graphical representation of a triangle with its dimensions and area formula
User
User entity class for tracking and managing user scores.
